name: Espresso
description: A rich and intense coffee shot with a smooth, bold flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee with steamed milk and frothy foam on top.

name: Latte
description: A smooth blend of espresso and steamed milk with a light layer of foam.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious mix of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk with whipped cream.

name: Americano
description: A strong, simple coffee made with espresso and hot water.

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso with a dollop of steamed milk, offering a bold, rich taste.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety smooth blend of espresso and micro-foamed milk.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Cold, refreshing coffee served over ice with optional milk and syrup.
